00030 ultimix.permit.SuccessFunction = function( Data , Waiting )
00031 {
00032       return(
00033             function( Result )
00034             {
00035                   if( Result == ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES )
00036                   {
00037                         ultimix.data_form.AddDataToForm( Data );
00038                   
00039                         document.getElementById( 'data_form' ).submit();
00040                         
00041                         if( Waiting )
00042                         {
00043                               ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00044                         }
00045                   }
00046             }
00047       );
00048 }

00065 ultimix.permit.SubmitPermitButton = function( Permit , MasterId , MasterType , Checkboxes , Action )
00066 {
00067       ultimix.data_form.CreateForm();
00068       
00069       if( Checkboxes != '' )
00070       {
00071             if( !ultimix.RecordSelected( Checkboxes , 'at_least_one_record_must_be_selected' ) )
00072             {
00073                   return;
00074             }
00075             
00076             var               ids = ultimix.GetIdentificators( Checkboxes );
00077             var               Data = { 'permit' : Permit , 'master_id' : MasterId , 'master_type' : MasterType , 'ids' : ids };
00078       }
00079       else
00080       {
00081             var               Data = { 'permit' : Permit , 'master_id' : MasterId , 'master_type' : MasterType };
00082       }
00083       
00084       Data[ Action ] = 1;
00085       
00086       var               Success = ultimix.permit.SuccessFunction( Data , true );
00087       
00088       ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'are_you_shure' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Question' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YESNO | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONQUESTION | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL , Success );
00089       return;
00090       
00091       Success( ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES );
00092 }

00107 ultimix.permit.SetPermitButton = function( Permit , MasterId , MasterType , Checkboxes )
00108 {
00109       ultimix.permit.SubmitPermitButton( Permit , MasterId , MasterType , Checkboxes , 'set_permit' );
00110 }

00251 function    AddPermit( PermitName )
00252 {
00253       if( PermitName != '' )
00254       {
00255             document.getElementById( 'permit_list' ).removeChild( document.getElementById( PermitName + '_div_id_rest' ) );
00256             document.getElementById( 'all_permits_div_id' ).innerHTML += "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='" + PermitName + "_div_id'></div>";
00257             document.getElementById( PermitName + '_div_id' ).innerHTML += "<input type='hidden' id='" + PermitName + "_field_id' name='permits[]' value='" + PermitName + "'><a href=\"javascript:DeletePermit( '" + PermitName + "' );\">" + PermitName + "</a><br>";
00258       }
00259 }
00260 
00266 function    DeletePermit( PermitName )
00267 {
00268       if( PermitName != '' )
00269       {
00270             document.getElementById( 'all_permits_div_id' ).removeChild( document.getElementById( PermitName + '_div_id' ) );
00271             document.getElementById( 'permit_list' ).innerHTML += "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='" + PermitName + "_div_id_rest'></div>";
00272             document.getElementById( PermitName + '_div_id_rest' ).innerHTML += " <a href=\"javascript:AddPermit( '" + PermitName + "' );\">" + PermitName + "</a><br>";
00273       }
00274 }

00281 function    AddGroup( GroupName )
00282 {
00283       if( GroupName != '' )
00284       {
00285             document.getElementById( 'group_list' ).removeChild( document.getElementById( GroupName + '_div_id_rest' ) );
00286             document.getElementById( 'all_groups_div_id' ).innerHTML += "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='" + GroupName + "_div_id'></div>";
00287             document.getElementById( GroupName + '_div_id' ).innerHTML += "<input type='hidden' id='" + GroupName + "_field_id' name='groups[]' value='" + GroupName + "'><a href=\"javascript:DeleteGroup( '" + GroupName + "' );\">" + GroupName + "</a><br>";
00288       }
00289 }
